document_data.name: ''Spear of the Unicorn''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Spear of the Unicorn''''' was an elegantly designed [[magic]]al [[spear]]. The head of the weapon was carved in the shape of a [[unicorn|unicorn's horn]]. Whether or not it was forged, crafted, or an actual horn from the [[:Category:Magical beasts|magical beast]] was unknown.
document_data.Power: The wielder of the [[enchanted]] spear was immune to ''[[Hold person|hold]]'' and ''[[Charm person|charm]]'' [[spell]]s. It also possessed a potent ''+3'' enchantment that guided the wielder's hands forwards the target and enhanced the damage done. Additionally, the spear's wielder had a higher chance of surviving magics that could instantly end their life.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], the ''Unicorn Spear'' was found in a [[troll]] den near the cottage of the witch [[Adratha]], outside the city of [[Trademeet]].
